title: Poor pay threatens Nigeria’s medicine future, warns ex-Ogun health commissioner

content: The Former Commissioner for Health in Ogun State, Dr Babatunde Ipaye, on Wednesday raised the alarm over what he described as the “unacceptable” poor remuneration for the medical doctors in the count… [+5030 chars]
